name: Chuck Stevenson
introduction: Chuck Stevenson (born 15 October 1919 and died 21 August 1995) was an American racecar driver who entered the Indianapolis 500 from 1951 to 1954 and from 1960 to 1965. His Indianapolis 500 results between 1951 and 1960 were included in the Formula One championship, although he failed to score any points towards the championship.
